name: Zombie Island - The Gameshow
description:
This Game is based on my Tutorials, this price was only to support my free Tutorials... but this game is pirated so i give a 100% Sale - Lifetime ;)

Support me on Patreon instead.

WASD - Controls
Spacebar - Jump
L - Open Menu, also Item Buy Menu
C - Prone

Zombie Island - The Gameshow

You are in a Gameshow and must survive.
The only way to survive is to earn your respect to the spectators.
More Spectators means more Money.
More Money means better Weapons and more Famous!

BEWARE
More spectators and famous means also faster and stronger Undead's!
Can you Survive, can you be a Famous Star on the new Undead Gameshow?

Do you want to create also a game similar to this one? Then watch my Tutorials on YouTube
